analyze_wildcard.description: Specify whether wildcards and prefix queries in the query string query should be analyzed (default: false)

analyzer.description: The analyzer for the query string query

default_operator.description: The default operator for query string query (AND or OR)

df.description: The default field for query string query (default: _all)

fields.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return in the response

lenient.description: Specify whether format-based query failures (such as providing text to a numeric field) should be ignored

lowercase_expanded_terms.description: Specify whether query terms should be lowercased

parent.description: The ID of the parent document

preference.description: Specify the shards the operation should be performed on (default: random shard)

q.description: Query in the Lucene query string syntax

source.description: The URL-encoded query definition (instead of using the request body)

body.description: The query definition using the Query DSL
